plugin.name: miniwin_cp
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: Shows campaign objectives in a miniwindow
plugin.description:
Shows outstanding campaign objectives.
To activate, type: cp check
TODO: add ability to colour mobs in scan

muclient.script:
option_set_default('cmd', 'cp') option_set_default('plugin_colour', 'steelblue')
cmd_update('help', 'send_to_world', true)
add_cmd('check', {func=nofunc, help="", send_to_world=false})
set_send_to_world(true)
window_set(cpwin)
init_plugin_vars() set_plugin_alias()
